intro: Roettlera aurea, commonly known as golden roettlera, is a flowering plant native to the eastern United States. It is a member of the Rubiaceae family, which includes coffee and gardenias. Roettlera aurea thrives in moist, woodland environments and is often found in shaded areas under the canopy of larger trees.
